turns.content:
Certainly! Here are the details for the remaining pizzas:

1. Fig and prosciutto: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, figs, and balsamic glaze.
2. Bacon and ranch: Ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, bacon, and green onions.
3. Chicken bacon ranch: Ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, and green onions.
4. Artichoke: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, artichoke hearts, and roasted red peppers.
5. Steak and mushroom: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced steak, mushrooms, and red onion.
6. Ricotta and honey: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, and honey drizzle.
7. Buffalo chicken with blue cheese: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, blue cheese, and red onion.
8. Shrimp scampi with spinach: Garlic butter, mozzarella cheese, shrimp, garlic, spinach, and parsley.
9. Margherita with prosciutto: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, and fresh basil.
10. Chicken pesto: Pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and sun-dried tomatoes.
11. Philly cheesesteak with mushrooms: Garlic butter, mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced steak, mushrooms, and onions.
12. Chicken bacon ranch with spinach: Ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, spinach, and green onions.
13. Meatball: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, meatballs, and parmesan cheese.
14. Buffalo chicken with ranch: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, and red onion.
15. Bacon wrapped jalapeño popper: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, bacon, jalapeños, and cream cheese.
16. Margherita with balsamic glaze: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and balsamic glaze.
17. Chicken alfredo with broccoli: Alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, broccoli, and garlic.
18. Greek with chicken: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, feta cheese, chicken, kalamata olives, and red onion.
19. Mushroom and spinach with garlic: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, spinach, and garlic.
20. Margherita with garlic: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and garlic.
21. Buffalo chicken with bacon: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, and red onion.
22. Chicken Caesar: Caesar dressing, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and romaine lettuce.
23. BBQ chicken with bacon: BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, and red onion.
24. S'mores dessert pizza: Chocolate spread, marshmallows, and graham cracker crumbs.
25. Chicken fajita: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bell peppers, onions, and cheddar cheese.
26. Taco salad: Refried beans, taco seasoning, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, olives, and avocado.
27. Buffalo chicken with ranch and blue cheese: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, blue cheese, and red onion.
28. Pepperoni and mushroom: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and mushrooms.
29. Margherita with prosciutto and arugula: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, arugula, and balsamic glaze.
30. Chicken and bacon with ranch: Ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, and red onion.
31. Buffalo chicken with jalapeños: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, jalapeños, and red onion.
32. BBQ chicken

1. BBQ chicken with red onion: BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, red onion, and cilantro.
2. Meat lovers: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.
3. Chicken teriyaki: Teriyaki sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, green peppers, and red onion.
4. Spinach and feta: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, spinach, feta cheese, and garlic.
5. Buffalo chicken with ranch and bacon: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, bacon, and red onion.
6. Hawaiian: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple, and bacon.
7. BBQ chicken with pineapple: BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, pineapple, and red onion.
8. Chicken and broccoli with garlic: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, chicken, broccoli, and garlic.
9. Taco pizza: Refried beans, taco seasoning, cheddar cheese, ground beef, lettuce, tomato, and olives.
10. White pizza: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, garlic, and parmesan cheese.
11. Pesto with goat cheese: Pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, goat cheese, and sun-dried tomatoes.
12. Buffalo chicken with ranch and blue cheese and bacon: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, blue cheese, bacon, and red onion.
13. Chicken cordon bleu: Alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ham, and Swiss cheese.
14. Philly cheesesteak with green peppers: Garlic butter, mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced steak, green peppers, and onions.
15. BBQ chicken with bacon and red onion: BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, red onion, and cilantro.
16. Veggie: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and black olives.
17. Chicken tikka masala: Tikka masala sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and cilantro.
18. Margherita with prosciutto and arugula and balsamic glaze: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, arugula, and balsamic glaze.
19. Chicken and broccoli alfredo: Alfredo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, broccoli, and garlic.
20. Bacon and egg breakfast pizza: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, bacon, scrambled eggs, and green onions.
21. BBQ chicken with green peppers: BBQ sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, green peppers, and red onion.
22. Chicken and artichoke: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, artichoke hearts, and garlic.
23. Buffalo chicken with ranch and blue cheese and jalapeños: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, blue cheese, jalapeños, and red onion.
24. Chicken and pesto with sun-dried tomatoes: Pesto sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, and sun-dried tomatoes.
25. Margherita with prosciutto and arugula and garlic: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, arugula, and garlic.
26. Chicken bacon ranch with green peppers: Ranch dressing, mozzarella cheese, chicken, bacon, green peppers, and red onion.
27. Spinach and artichoke: Olive oil, mozzarella cheese, spinach, artichoke hearts, and garlic.
28. Buffalo chicken with ranch and blue cheese and bacon and jalapeños: Buffalo sauce, mozzarella cheese, chicken, ranch dressing, blue cheese, bacon, jalapeños, and red onion.
29. Philly cheesesteak with green peppers and mushrooms: Garlic butter, mozzarella cheese,
